CustomField.description: Per Section 2 of the RLP, Asbestos, the property ___ Contains no Asbestos-Containing Materials (ACM), or contains ACM in a stable, solid matrix that is not damaged or submject to damage _____Contains ACM not ina stable, solid matrix
CustomField.label: Asbestos Declaration

value.fullName: Contains ACM in a stable, solid matrix that is not damaged or subject to damage
value.label: Contains ACM in a stable, solid matrix that is not damaged or subject to damage

value.fullName: Contains ACM not in a stable, solid matrix
value.label: Contains ACM not in a stable, solid matrix

value.fullName: Property contains ACM not in a stable, solid matrix
value.label: Property contains ACM not in a stable, solid matrix

value.fullName: Property contains no Asbestos-Containing Materials (ACM) or Property contains ACM in a stable, solid matrix that is not damaged or subject to damage
value.label: Property contains no Asbestos-Containing Materials (ACM) or Property contains ACM in a stable, solid matrix that is not damaged or subject to damage
